title: Lag in-game
body:
Hi All,

For the past two day I've had extremely bad lag in-game but only ever after 5pm on both days. I tired forwarding on both my Security Software and Router both of which did nothing.

I did an online Lag Report for the last day which reported back a result of 12/100 and ran a trace route to the OCE servers both of which failed:

Tracing route to 103.240.227.25 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  SYNOLOGYROUTER [10.0.4.1] 
  2     1 ms     1 ms     1 ms  lbn-collins-1-a.activenet.com.au [103.224.112.250] 
  3     3 ms     5 ms     4 ms  edge-530collins-10G.spectrum.com.au [103.224.112.249] 
  4     5 ms     2 ms     2 ms  as4826.vic.ix.asn.au [218.100.78.11] 
  5    14 ms    15 ms    14 ms  BE-151.cor02.mel07.vic.VOCUS.net.au [114.31.196.50] 
  6    17 ms    15 ms    14 ms  Hu-0-0-0-1.cor02.syd04.nsw.VOCUS.net.au [114.31.192.114] 
  7    18 ms    14 ms    17 ms  bundle-100.bdr01.syd01.nsw.VOCUS.net.au [114.31.192.51] 
  8   261 ms   231 ms   256 ms  static-150.175.255.49.in-addr.VOCUS.net.au [49.255.175.150] 
  9     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 10     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 11     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 12     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 13     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 14     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 15     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 16     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 17     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 18     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 19     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 20     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 21     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 22     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 23     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 24     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 25     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 26     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 27     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 28     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 29     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 30     *        *        *     Request timed out.

Trace complete.

I currently have no clue on what to do to resolve this issue, this issue only affected League itself no other websites or games are showing any sign of lag.

replies.body:
I'd recommend submitting the tracert results to player support, they should be able to point you in the right direction.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
